TopicTitle: Shooting down craft that you are almost done deorbiting

Articles.Content: Hello KSP Forums! I have a quick question. Am I the only one who enjoys building vanilla (stock but without the DLC) missile launchers and shoot them at craft that I have landing at KSC via kOS?
That's a new one to me, but it sounds fun.  I've never used KOS though.
I have never done that but, I can see how one could derive vast amounts of enjoyment from doing so.
